hints.content: First, we need to find $3\dfrac34$ feet on the number line.

$3\dfrac34$ is after $3$ but before $4$.

[[☃ image 1]]

There are $4$ equal parts, or fourths, between each whole. We can use equivalent fractions to label each tick.

[[☃ image 2]]

options.alt: A line plot that has, moving left to right, labeled tick marks at 3 and 4. Between the labeled tick marks are three equally-spaced unlabeled tick marks. !
A line plot that has, moving left to right, labeled tick marks at 3, 3 and one-fourth, 3 and one-half, 3 and three-fourths, and 4. The 3 and three-fourths tick mark is highlighted. !

hints.content:
Each dot represents one jump.

So, we need to count all of the dots on the line plot that represent jumps that are $3\dfrac34$ feet long.

[[☃ image 1]]

There is $\greenE1$ dot that represents lengths that are $3\dfrac34$ feet.

options.alt: A line plot labeled Frog jump lengths (feet) shows, moving left to right, labeled tick marks at 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, and 7. Three unlabeled tick marks appear between each labeled tick mark. Dots are plotted as follows: 1 dot above 2, 2 dots above the second unlabeled tick mark after 2, 2 dots above the first unlabeled tick mark after 3, 3 dots above the second unlabeled tick mark after 3, 1 dot above the third unlabeled tick mark after 3, 1 dot above the first unlabeled tick mark after 4, 3 dots above the second unlabeled tick mark after 4, 2 dots above 5, 2 dots above the second unlabeled tick mark after 5, and 1 dot above the first unlabeled tick mark after 6. The third unlabeled tick mark after 3 and 1 dot above it are highlighted. !

question.content:
The jump lengths of some frogs are shown below.  

[[☃ image 1]]

**How many jumps measured $3\dfrac34$ feet?** 
 
[[☃ input-number 1]] jumps

options.alt: A line plot labeled Frog jump lengths (feet) shows, moving left to right, labeled tick marks at 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, and 7. Three unlabeled tick marks appear between each labeled tick mark. Dots are plotted as follows: 1 dot above 2, 2 dots above the second unlabeled tick mark after 2, 2 dots above the first unlabeled tick mark after 3, 3 dots above the second unlabeled tick mark after 3, 1 dot above the third unlabeled tick mark after 3, 1 dot above the first unlabeled tick mark after 4, 3 dots above the second unlabeled tick mark after 4, 2 dots above 5, 2 dots above the second unlabeled tick mark after 5, and 1 dot above the first unlabeled tick mark after 6. !
